#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int minj(int *arr,int n)
{
  int en[n],j,i;
  int INT_MAX=1000000001;
  en[0]=0,en[1]=0;
  for(j=2;j<=n;j++)
  {
      en[j]=INT_MAX;
      for(i=1;i<=j;i=i*2)
      {
          int diff=j-i;

          if(en[j]>abs(arr[j]-arr[diff])+en[diff])
          {
              en[j]=abs(arr[j]-arr[diff])+en[diff];
               //break;
          }

      }
  }

return en[n];

}
int main()
{

    int tst,n,i,arr[200001];
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
       scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
   cout<<minj(arr,n)<<"\n";


    return 0;
}
